message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product, which is a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $825000. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $850000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $815000 for the product, which is a fair price considering the market value.

I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $845000. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and rarity.

I'm willing to make a final offer of $840000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. If you're still not satisfied, I'll need to consider other options.
